plot: In this 3D animated short, Martian President Zath declares war on the planet Earth. Caped Super Hero Captain Awesome comes to the rescue.
title: Captain Awesome
plot_es: In this 3D animated short, Martian President Zath declares war on the planet Earth. Caped Super Hero Captain Awesome comes to the rescue.
plot_en: In this 3D animated short, Martian President Zath declares war on the planet Earth. Caped Super Hero Captain Awesome comes to the rescue.
